Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/mpfr/dist/src/set_rnd.c

1/* mpfr_set_default_rounding_mode -- set the default rounding mode
2 mpfr_get_default_rounding_mode -- get the default rounding mode
3

12option) any later version.
13

16or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public
17License for more details.
18

20along with the GNU MPFR Library; see the file COPYING.LESSER. If not, see
21http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ or write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2251 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. */
23
24#include "mpfr-impl.h"
25
26MPFR_THREAD_VAR (mpfr_rnd_t, __gmpfr_default_rounding_mode, MPFR_RNDN)
27
28void
29mpfr_set_default_rounding_mode (mpfr_rnd_t rnd_mode)
30{
31 if (rnd_mode >= MPFR_RNDN && rnd_mode < MPFR_RND_MAX)
32 __gmpfr_default_rounding_mode = rnd_mode;
33}
34
35#undef mpfr_get_default_rounding_mode
36mpfr_rnd_t
37mpfr_get_default_rounding_mode (void)
38{
39 return __gmpfr_default_rounding_mode;
40}
41
